revised_title: An Unusual Lunar Phenomenon Observed by Thomas Stretton and Mr. Wilkins
tldr: This article describes an observation of a star-like appearance on the dark part of the moon by Thomas Stretton and Mr. Wilkins. The phenomenon was seen at different locations and around the same time, suggesting a possible connection. The authors discuss the circumstances of the observation and the possibility of it being related to similar phenomena observed by Dr. Herschel and Domnic Cassini.
